title: Help a farming family in Erode, Tamil Nadu selling 20,000 coconuts?
selftext:
Hello, all 

i am helping one farming family in erode, who have 20,000 mature coconuts. 

do you think anyone of you can help? Or guide?

Like where to find buyers?

They are ready to sell for 15 rs each. (excluding shipping that can range between 2 rs to 10 rs depending on shipping method/quantity) 

market rate is around 30-35 rs.

their website is [www.apanest.buzz](https://www.apanest.buzz) you can check it out. 

cheers! 

​
comments: Bro, convert that to coconut oil. Sell in bulk.
Try posting on your local Facebook and WhatsApp groups. They have better reach.
Have you considered exporting? Contact local trading companies. China s buying big bulk and signing lease with coconut farms.
Pay 700-800 Rs to any popular journalist and ask her to tweet this adding emotional touch. All will be sold out within a month
i wish i knew such people
